Pre-Game Insights: The home teams in the NLCS have won each of the first four games.
The D-backs scored three runs in the eighth inning off old friend Craig Kimbrel to stun the Phillies in Game 4 on Friday, tying the series 2-2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The home team has won every game so far in the NLCS.
The D-backs are undefeated at home this season, winning all three games at Chase Field in addition to their 4-2 road record.
Others: Zack Wheeler will start for the Phillies, while Zac Gallen will start for the D-backs in Game 5.
The D-backs are looking to get a huge leg up in the series with a win on Saturday.
